source.constant: US Census Bureau 2010 FIPS Codes for Counties and County Equivalent Entities

direct.H1: active county or statistically equivalent entity
direct.H4: legally defined inactive or nonfunctioning county or statistically equivalent entity
direct.H5: census areas in Alaska, a statistical county equivalent entity
direct.H6: county or statistically equivalent entity that is areally coextensive or governmentally consolidated with an incorporated place, part of an incorporated place, or a consolidated city
direct.C7: incorporated place that is an independent city; that is, it also serves as a county equivalent because it is not part of any county, and a minor civil division (MCD) equivalent because it is not part of any MCD
